title: Someone was kind enough to properly update Noxus on the map.

replies.body: {{champion:240}} "It's my property! All sixty gazillion acres of it!"

> [{quoted}](name=Colton147,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=tw1rVrrV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-25T00:11:51.878+0000)
>
> {{champion:240}} "It's my property! All sixty gazillion acres of it!"

I still want a Fiddlesticks vs Kled Vs event
They'd have a _field_ day with that one.

You have a story for it?

Not sure if this has some story to it for Garen VS Darius:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OIyNXRrMnxc&feature=youtu.be

If this is the case the entire map should just be labeled "KLED".

{{champion:240}} "There ain't no land that ain't mine. Just land I ain't got around to claiming."

Actually I would Like to point out he DOES give a finite amount of land that he owns:
"It's my property! All sixty gazillion acres of it!"
Now according to google a gazillion is: "1970s: fanciful formation on the pattern of billion and million ."
So following that pattern (and knowing that he is bad with words: 
"I knew he was a liar, 'cause he used them big words." and "I don't have trouble communicating. Words is just treacherous bastards.") 
he must mean the next one in line 60 trillion.

So 60 trillion acres! Unfortunately that would make rune Terra 488 times (at least [IF he owned it all]) bigger than earth, HOWEVER if he means BILLION, then of the 123 billion acres that earth has, he would own less that half :) 

Likely though he means million (without exageration!) which would put his territiory at about the size of The united Kingdom and 
Uganda (I HOPE THAT'S JUST A COINCIDENCE!!!).
How the hell does he keep track of securing such a big land mass?
You came to the wrong neighborhood
"What is property? why did this dead hamster want me off of it"
Honestly that's pretty interesting and might explain why their aren't more settlements around that large area.

I wonder what my land would look like... Maybe Similar to Kled's map perhaps?

{{champion:240}} Now would you be so kind to GET OFF MY PROPERTY!?!??

{{champion:163}} ~~I don't even wanna know where this is going.~~
Ngl it kinda looks like a dead fish.
